channel.title: Comments on: Todo in 2009
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.content:encoded:
One of the main reasons I went back to school is because I wanted to be able to teach down the road.

Do you have any specific plans to start off with?

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Teaching? Interesting choice, never expected you to do that
item.content:encoded: Teaching? Interesting choice, never expected you to do that

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Well, if it means anything, I've certainly learned a great deal from you so you're off to a good start. ;-)
